name: Coven Name Generator
description: Conjure up the perfect moniker for your witchy collective! Whether you're brewing potions or plotting world domination (the fun kind!), a killer coven name is essential. Unleash your inner enchantress and discover a name that resonates with your coven's unique vibe.
introduction: Welcome, sisters (and non-binary siblings!), to the ultimate Coven Name Generator! Tired of calling yourselves 'The Ladies Who Lunch'? Need a name that screams power, mystery, and maybe just a *little* bit of mischief? You've come to the right place. Prepare to be spellbound!
howToUse: First, close your eyes and channel your inner witch (or wizard, or whatever magical being you identify with!).
Next, click that gloriously tempting 'Generate' button. Don't be shy!
Behold! A coven name, fresh from the cauldron of creativity!
Not feeling it? No problem! Click again! We've got more names than a grimoire has pages.
Found the perfect name? Congratulations! Now go forth and conquer... responsibly, of course. (Maybe offer some helpful spells along the way.)

faqs.question: Is this generator *actually* magical?
faqs.answer: While we can't guarantee actual magical properties (results may vary!), we *can* guarantee a name that sounds pretty darn magical. Plus, believing is half the battle, right?

faqs.question: Can I use these names for other things besides covens?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Use them for your book club, your D&D group, your competitive pie-baking team... the possibilities are endless! Just promise to credit us when you become famous.

faqs.question: Are the names generated random?
faqs.answer: They're *mostly* random, but we've carefully curated the prefixes and suffixes to ensure a witchy, wonderful vibe. A little bit of chaos, a whole lot of charm.

faqs.question: What if I don't like any of the generated names?
faqs.answer: Keep clicking! We've got a vast reservoir of names just waiting to be discovered. Or, get inspired and combine elements from different names to create something truly unique!

faqs.question: Is this generator safe to use around cats?
faqs.answer: Perfectly safe! In fact, your feline familiar might even offer some suggestions. (Just be sure to translate their meows carefully.)

faqs.question: Can I use this to name my band?
faqs.answer: Witches and rock music? A match made in hell! Go for it and let us know when you're headlining a festival.
